headline: Zebra Technologies (ZBRA) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: William Burns: Thank you, Mike.  For the quarter, we realized sales of $1.3 billion, a 5% increase from the prior year, and adjusted EBITDA margin of 21.6%, a 20 basis point improvement, and non-GAAP diluted earnings per share of $3.88, which was 11% higher than the prior year.

headline: Why Zebra (ZBRA) Stock Is Falling Today
summary: Shares of enterprise data capture company Zebra Technologies (NASDAQ:ZBRA) fell 14.1% in the morning session after investors focused on shrinking profit margins despite its third-quarter results beating profit estimates.

headline: Raised Guidance and Strong Q3 Results Could Be a Game Changer for Zebra Technologies (ZBRA)
summary: Zebra Technologies Corporation recently reported third-quarter results, beating analyst expectations with US$1.32 billion in revenue and providing fourth-quarter sales growth guidance of 8% to 11% year-over-year, supported by acquisitions and favorable currency impacts. Notably, the company also raised its full-year earnings outlook, reflecting optimism about continued operational improvements and the integration of recent acquisitions like Elo into its expanding portfolio. We'll explore how...

headline: Zebra Technologies Tops Q3 Views, Guides Above Estimates

headline: Zebra (NASDAQ:ZBRA) Posts Q3 Sales In Line With Estimates
summary: Enterprise data capture company Zebra Technologies (NASDAQ:ZBRA) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q3 CY2025, with sales up 5.2% year on year to $1.32 billion. The company expects next quarter’s revenue to be around $1.46 billion, coming in 2.4% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $3.88 per share was 3.4% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Zebra: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results beat Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $3.75 per share. The producer of printers for bar codes, plastic cards and, radio-frequency identification tags posted revenue of $1.32 billion in the period, also beating Street forecasts.

headline: Zebra Technologies Announces Third-Quarter 2025 Results
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., October 28, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today announced results for the third quarter ended September 27, 2025.
